recommendations: Nikhil Dhaka ‚ÄúBhavya has always been a crucial part of our team at slice and has made significant contributions to UPI tech stack. He has been an all rounder, being great in execution, quality and stakeholder management while at the same time mentoring other team members to make them successful as well. Once a responsibility is given to him, you can almost forget about it and assume that it will be done. Really reliable and great dev, keeps the team's spirit up with his jolly nature. Keep up the good work !!‚Äù

He is always ready to take initiative and contribute to team goals with enthusiasm and dedication. I highly recommend Bhavya for any position in backend development.‚Äù
